meanings.definition: The part of the face above the mouth that includes the nostrils and organs of smell.
meanings.sent1: She touched her nas gently to check if she had a cold.
meanings.sent2: His nas twitched as he smelled the delicious food.
meanings.sent3: The clown painted a silly face on his nas for the party.
meanings.sent4: The nas of the mountain breathed in the fresh air.
meanings.sent5: The nas of the dog wiggled excitedly when it caught a scent.
